title: Can I change summoner name instantly?
body: I have been playing this game for a while and I want to change my summoner name. I've had this name for a while and I don't want to completely part with it. Am I able to change my summoner name and then make a new account with my old name AS SOON as I change it? Or will the old name be locked for a while?  (ex: change this accounts summoner name then immediately make a new account with the old name) Does that account also have to be level 30?

replies.body:
The account doesn't have to be level 30. *Lew* is correct, the name should become available the moment you change it from your main. If you'd like assistance or run into any issues, you can always reach out to an account specialist in a [**support ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).

Let me know if you have any questions.
The summoner name should be freed up once you change it to something else and can be taken by a level one account.
